Package model

Interface DAOIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAO
    public interface DAOIF
    DAOIF gives interface for DAO class. The game-engine connects to the database through this interface.
    Version:
    2.5 01.03.2021
    Author:
    Aki Koppinen
